names: Freda, Heithur, Sigrid, Eldrin, Thrain, Eirik, Brynhild, Hilda, Gunnar, Astrid, Bjorn, Ingrid, Leif, Solveig, Ragnhild, Torsten, Freya, Halvar, Sigrun, Einar, Gudrun

hooks.name: Freda's Angry Suitors
hooks.description: Local silversmith Freda has been receiving unwanted attention from a group of suitors. She is not interested in any of them, and they are becoming increasingly aggressive in their pursuit.
hooks.gmNotes: Freda has actually been seeing someone else in secret, and the suitors are not just being annoying, they are actually dangerous.

hooks.name: The Missing Miners
hooks.description: A group of miners has gone missing in the mountains. The local authorities are looking for help to find them.
hooks.gmNotes: The miners were actually kidnapped by a group of bandits who are using the mines as a hideout.

hooks.name: The Haunted Mine
hooks.description: A local mine is said to be haunted by the ghosts of miners who died in a cave-in. The locals are too scared to go near it.
hooks.gmNotes: The ghosts are actually just a group of bandits using the mine as a hideout.

hooks.name: The Stolen Silver
hooks.description: A shipment of silver has gone missing on its way to the local market. The authorities are looking for help to find it.
hooks.gmNotes: The silver was actually stolen by a group of bandits who are using it to fund their operations.
